doc.name: headingChanged
doc.summary: Sent to the current card of the defaultStack when the heading of the device changes.

example.p: updateMapPosition theHeading -- update the marker on the map showing the current heading

description.overview: Handle the headingChanged message if you want to perform tasks when the heading of the device changes.

parameter.name: heading
parameter.description: the heading of the device, in degrees relative to true north if available, otherwise relative to magnetic north

description.comments:
The headingChanged message is sent to the current card of the defaultStack when the heading of the device changes.
If heading tracking cannot be started (typically due to a lack of calibration) then a trackingError message is sent instead.
